comment: sweet and spicey like winter or christmas. hints of cinnamon and nutmeg. smooth finish

Great for the Fall/Winter. Sweet flavor but keep in mind that it’s 82 proof so it is not syrupy like the William Wolf or Ballotin products (which are delicious but a bit too sweet for me). Even if the spices were not in this, the whiskey would be considered a solid everyday drinker.

Liquid Christmas. The spices invoke memories of the holidays and family. It is good but I find I can enjoy it only in small doses. I suspect it will make some interesting cocktails but I only tried it neat.
Like the flavors, but the slight sweetness and thickness reminded me of cheap liquor.
Spice up front but smooth. Nice fall sip.
